mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lancets in silver case
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The case contains four lancets; each blade is protected by hinged covers made of tortoise shell; including the covers each lancet is 5.5 cm long. The outside of the case has decorative engravings and the initials of the original owner: HKS; Hendrik Krieger Schumer (1797-1864) was a surgeon in Amersterdam, Holland. According to the donor, he had six daughters, the youngest was married in 1851 to the great-grandfather of the donor.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
